column1: And sex with Eskimo children requires some special skills.

But I'm not saying it's wrong, I'm just saying... she's gonna have to deal with racist people out there! People turning their heads and saying, "Oh, look at the two black people together. That figures!"
Yeah, just try the white meat. I know it's a little dry, but... there's a lot more of it.
I'm sorry, but she's at the Denver Nuggets game.
Yeah, she went with a nice white, Jewish boy.
